Method Detail

replaceAll

public static java.lang.String replaceAll(java.lang.String expression,
                                          java.lang.String oldString,
                                          java.lang.String newString)
Replaces all old string within the expression with new strings.

Parameters:
expression - The string being processed.
oldString - The string to replace.
newString - The string to replace the old string with.
Returns:
The new expression with all of the old strings replaced with new strings.

isSpace

public static boolean isSpace(char character)
Determines if a character is a space or white space.

Parameters:
character - The character being evaluated.
Returns:
True if the character is a space or white space and false if not.
